nodes.text: At some point during the blockade of the Anoat sector by the Galactic Empire, a battle took place on the devastated planet of Anoat. Knowing that Anoat held secrets valuable to its enemies, the Empire sought to lock down the planet. However, the resistance movement known as the Uprising fought the Empire for the buried secrets of Anoat.

This battle is a "Sector Battle," a game-wide event that earns the players powerful rewards and dictates the expansion of in-game content. The canonical outcome of a Sector Battle is not known, since it is determined by the players' involvement. However, the motives of the battle were addressed in the in-game description.
